summary: An ordinance establishing, modifying and abrogating certain positions in the Park, Engineering, Lighting, Police, Health, Executive and Building Depts. and in the offices of the Treasurer, Comptroller, Employees' Retirement System and the Municipal Court; fixing compensations; superseding the 1962 Salary Ordinance (90800) insofar as in conflict and providing funds by appropriation, budget item transfers and partially reimbursable appropriations from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
